name: Nancy Drew®: Last Train to Blue Moon Canyon
description: Catch this train — it’s your ticket to solving a century-old mystery!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista Processor: 1GHz CPU Memory: 128MB RAM Graphics: 32-bit DirectX 8.0 compatible video card DirectX®: 8.0 or higher Hard Drive: 650MB of free space Sound: 16-bit DirectX compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: Definitely one of my favorite Nancy Drew games. The Hardy Brothers were a fun addition and I especially liked how I didn't have to spend large amounts of time wandering aimlessly around to find things as the train is much easier to get used to, in my personal opinion. If you're a fan of Nancy Drew games, or just want a fun mystery point-and-click to pass the time, get it!

I have played several Nancy Drew games, and this one is my favorite so far! Perfect balance of characters, creepiness, fun, and puzzles. Loved it. Plus, who doesn't love the Hardy Boys? Cheeseburgers.
Love all the nancy drew games. They are calm and easy for the most part
